name: Tenebrous Mimiflora
desc:
Abyssal monsters that have descended to this world from the deep, dark depths of a twisted and alien world, they possess a plant-like appearance.
It is said that where the corrosive waves of the dark tide lap, such plant-like dark monsters will grow. But they only bear a superficial resemblance to plants, for it is a form they only adopted to get closer to the tree-like world, that they might extract the necessary concepts from it, and analyze and imitate them.
Some raving lunatics who have lost their minds say that those things that extend out like leaves are actually the beginnings of gates to other worlds.

value.text: An Abyssal monster that has descended to this world from the deep, dark depths of a twisted and alien world, the Tenebrous Mimiflora can mimic various phenomena, and can deploy a Void Ward in combat. Some of its attacks can cause stackable Attrition that, after a time, will cause your active character to lose HP. Use <color=#ffe14b>a specific number of Elemental attacks</color> to destroy this creature's Ward. <color=#ffe14b>Nightsoul-aligned Elemental attacks</color> can break through its defenses more effectively.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Refractive Bud
dropMaterial.desc:
A leaf bud dropped by the monster known as the Tenebrous Mimiflora after being vanquished.
It is said that when this creature emerged from the Black Tide, the first things it grew were these tender buds capable of deflecting elemental power.

dropMaterial.name: Bewildering Broadleaf
dropMaterial.desc:
An arrow-shaped leaf dropped by the monster known as the Tenebrous Mimiflora after being vanquished.
After corroding the Ley Lines and extracting the memories within, the creature grows these leaves as a means of storing the information it has deciphered. There may be a close link between these intricately patterned leaves and the forms that their host can mimic.

dropMaterial.name: Illusory Leafcoil
dropMaterial.desc:
A core formed from tightly coiled leaves, the remnant of the monster known as the Tenebrous Mimiflora after being vanquished.
It may appear lifeless and dull on the surface, yet a faint, ominous power can still be sensed pulsing within.
People often wonder where the memories that such creatures drew from the earth go when they are slain. Perhaps the answer lies within this core...
